name: Everything Stack
description: AI-native application framework enabling Autonomous Software Development
longDescription: Building the foundational platform that enables Autonomous Software Development. Semantic search backbone, voice-first AI interaction, and modular tooling. The infrastructure that lets us build anythingâ€”from 3Cs to ambient AI systems to future applications.

name: 3Cs (Collaboration Software)
description: Solves the hard problems of group collaboration
longDescription: Connect-Consensus-Coordinate framework built on Everything Stack. The application that helps people organize together and resolve the coordination challenges that prevent communities from working effectively. First test case for scaling human collaboration through infrastructure.

name: Food Forest Experiments
description: Regenerative food systems on permaculture principles
longDescription: Testing whether we can feed one person on 0.1 acres with less than 20 hours/year of work. Permaculture-based design combining trees, shrubs, perennials, and integrated systems. Building proof that food abundance is possible at household scale through design, not external inputs.

name: PUD Village Infrastructure
description: Designing intentional communities at scale (250-2,000 people)
longDescription: 10-year vision for a regenerative village using Planned Unit Development zoning. Self-sufficient water, sewage, power systems. Mixed housing (multifamily core, single-family ring). Co-op + condo hybrid ownership. Built with 3Cs coordination and food forest principles. Proof that sustainable community infrastructure is buildable.

name: Your Own Ideas
description: What do you want to build?
longDescription: We're building the infrastructure for community abundance. What problems excite you? What systems do you want to experiment with? Come bring your ideas and we'll figure out how to make them real together.
